definition: a characteristic emotional quality, make mention of
details:
noun
- a characteristic emotional quality
= example: a characteristic emotional quality
- a brief written record
= example: a brief written record
- a short personal letter
= synonyms: billet
- a comment or instruction usually added
= example: a comment or instruction usually added
= synonyms: annotation
- a notation representing the pitch and duration of a musical sound
= example: a notation representing the pitch and duration of a musical sound
= synonyms: tone, musical note
- a tone of voice that shows what the speaker is feeling
= example: a tone of voice that shows what the speaker is feeling
- a piece of paper money, especially one issued by a central bank
= example: a piece of paper money, especially one issued by a central bank
= synonyms: bill
- a promise to pay a specified amount on demand or at a certain time
= example: a promise to pay a specified amount on demand or at a certain time
= synonyms: promissory note, note of hand
- high status importance owing to marked superiority
= synonyms: distinction
verb
- make mention of
= synonyms: remark, mention, observe
- make a written note of
= example: make a written note of
= synonyms: take down
- notice or perceive
= example: notice or perceive
= synonyms: mark
- observe with care or pay close attention to
= example: observe with care or pay close attention to
= synonyms: observe, take note
